title: Josep Borrell - Wikipedia
snippet: Josep Borrell Fontelles (Western Catalan: [dʒuˈzɛb boˈreʎ fonˈteʎes]; born 24 April 1947) is a Spanish politician who served as High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy and Vice-President of the European Commission from 2019 to 2024.

title: Josep Borrell
snippet: A graduate in Aeronautical Engineering from the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid and in Economics from the UCM, Mr. Borrell was a Mathematics Professor at the Higher Technical School of Aeronautical Engineering and at the UCM from 1972 to 1982. Roundtable “The future of Russia’s war on Ukraine: What role for the EU?” (2025)

title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: CIDOB Apr 02 2025 · Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. title: Josep Borrell – POLITICO
snippet: The current foreign policy chief says that while “we managed to get humanitarian aid to Gaza,” Josep Borrell’s “forceful” language made no headway. September 11, 2025 11:16 am CET · July 8, 2025 4:01 am CET · July 3, 2025 9:45 pm CET · June 20, 2025 6:25 pm CET ·
